Summary: It was around 8-9 pm and me and my girlfriend were outside having a cigarett when I happened to see out of my eye a huge 70 foot or so square object.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a summer night in July around 8-9 PM. My girlfriend and I had stepped out to have a cigarette, as we are talking I notice this huge square object out of the corner of my eye, I point to her look at that I say. We look in amazement 70 foot square object just silently gliding almost, through the air, 4 white lights on each corner no more than 500 feet off the ground, pulsating at the same time. The object was dark and outlined almost and for sure solid. Then like that it was gone in a flash.
